SearchFlags.description: Set of flags to control search behavior

maxAggValues.description: The maximum number of values in a facet aggregation

getSuggestions.description: Whether to request for search suggestions on the _entityName virtualized field

groupingSpec.description: Instructions for grouping results before returning

includeSoftDeleted.description: include soft deleted entities in results

includeRestricted.description: include restricted entities in results (default is to filter)

customHighlightingFields.description: Include mentioned fields inside elastic highlighting query

rewriteQuery.description: invoke query rewrite chain for filters based on configured rewriters

includeDefaultFacets.description:
Include default facets when getting facets to aggregate on in search requests.
By default we include these, but custom aggregation requests don't need them.

filterNonLatestVersions.description: Include only latest versions in version sets, default true

fieldConfiguration.description:
Which fieldConfiguration should be applied. The possible values
are defined in the configuration file `search_config.yaml`

sliceOptions.description:
Sets slice parameter for elasticsearch query,
to allow multiple clients to scroll the same query at once.
Only supported by the ElasticSearchService

GroupingSpec.description:
A set of directives to control how results are grouped.
The underlying generic groupings are nested to allow for further evolution of the grouping spec.

groupingCriteria.description: A list of generic directives to group results by.

baseEntityType.description:
The type of the entity to be grouped.
e.g. schemaField
Omitting this field will result in all base entities being grouped.

groupingEntityType.description:
The type of the entity to be grouped into.
e.g. dataset, domain, etc.
